name: Decode-url-bookmarklet
tagline: A simple bookmarklet that decodes the current pages URL, parses its query string parameters, and displays them in a popup.
body:
decode-url-bookmarklet
======================

A simple bookmarklet that decodes the current page URL, parses its query string parameters, and displays them in a popup.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
